channel.title: [Fixed] PC Rep++
channel.description: Hey, i just added a bgs in pest control and if a person wants to buy it it only cost 0 points? where would i go to make it cost 1000 points? help please btw its a PI server

item.title: [Fixed] PC Rep++
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Erm, I got one error, src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:133: orphaned case case 11696: ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

did i put this in right?

[code]currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " points.");

                    case 11696:
                    return 1000;
		return;
	}[/code]

[shadow=red,left]Edit:[/shadow] ah i got thanks Repp++

Read full topic

item.title: [Fixed] PC Rep++
item.dc:creator: @neil1111 neil1111
item.description:
@neil1111 wrote:

go to shopAssistant
src>server>model>shops
seach getSpecialItemValue
add this into the list under that

case 11696: return XXXX;
change the XXXX to the amount of points you want it to cost.
save compile.

Read full topic

item.title: [Fixed] PC Rep++

item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“stickywicky, post:4, topic:367681”]go into data->cfg->shops.cfg

then look for the shop that sells bgs and see if thiers anytrhing in thier that can help

p.s personally i think you should take the sword out because god swords are a hudgly used pk item and making people pk to get it is poinltess because it means people who hate pking carnt really get it then
but thats only personal thoughts[/quote]
that would be how you add the item in the shop? unless theres a way to change ether price in there? and its not in a pk shop, its in Pest Control as a reward.
